title: Rioters VS Players Nexus Siege throwdown! NA server on Fri 15th July @4PM PST.
body:
https://i.imgflip.com/m9soh.jpg

A siege is coming... how long can you hold out against us!? :)

Details of the mode here:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/nexus-siege

**What?:** Nexus Siege
**Where?:** NA server
**When?:** Fri 15th July @4PM PST
**How many games?:** We usually do 3+.
**Rioters:** The RGM team who made Nexus Siege + more!

Beezul
BuffMePlz
DefaultChar
L4T3NCY
Ponts
Rabid Llama
Rayven
Riot Bearricade
Riot Stephiroth
Riot Terra
Riot Vitzkrieg
SarumanTheBronze

-----------------------------------------------------

Edit 1: Creating rooms. Hang tight!

Room 1 FULL
Name: Nexus Siege throwdown #1
Pwd: siege4life
Rioters: L4T3NCY, BuffMePlz, Riot MoreChrono, Rayven, Riot Defaultchar

Room 2 FULL
Name: Nexus Siege throwdown #2
Pwd: beepboop
Rioters: Riot Stephiroth, Riot Bearricade, SarumanTheBronze, Riot Vitzkrieg

Room 3 FULL
Name: Nexus Siege throwdown #3
Pwd: siegey
Rioters: L4T3NCY, BuffMePlz, Riot MoreChrono, MANWOLFAXEBOSS, Riot Defaultchar

Room 4 FULL
Name: Nexus Siege throwdown #4
Pwd: beepboop2
Rioters: Riot Stephiroth, Riot Bearricade, SarumanTheBronze, Riot Vitzkrieg, Beezul

Room 5 FULL
Name: Nexus Siege throwdown #5
Pwd: siegetime
Rioters: L4T3NCY, Riot MoreChrono, MANWOLFAXEBOSS, Riot Defaultchar

Room 6 FULL
Name: Nexus Siege Throwdown: Beep!
Pwd: beepboop3
Rioters: Riot Stephiroth, Ponts, SarumanTheBronze, Riot Vitzkrieg, BuffMePlz

Room 7 FULL
Name: Nexus Siege FINAL GAME
Pwd: finalshowdown
Rioters: L4T3NCY, Riot Stephiroth, Ponts, SarumanTheBronze, Riot Vitzkrieg

Thanks for playing guys. Time to siege across the weekend. ^_^

{{champion:74}} Technically all the other Rioters are wrong as we're currently observing PDT (UTC -7), not PST (UTC -8).

Don't want you to miss us by an hour! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I don't think I'd be able to make an hour earlier.... luckily, the timezone converter automatically corrected, so this changes nothing for me >.>
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
neeeeeeeeerd
HOW ABOUT A SHACO???
I can assure you, @L4T3NCY loves Shaco.

Ha!
I'll finally be able to join you folks over on the NA servers!
So u wish for them to taste your delicious metal?
Just played, was real fun, hope they do something like this for other custom modes in the future.

I propose a Challenge to the RGM team, since it feels like APC/ADC's are dominant in every single RGM released bar URF (because we all know that's a ClusterF***) try to make a RGM that only allows one type of combat style (ranged or Melee) to compensate for players that don't have a single melee or ranged champion players get to choose from the full rooster of champions with those playstyles. Champions who can go melee or ranged (jayce and nidalee) will be grouped with the ranged champions for equality in the gamemode.
What Is Smite, sorry to disappoint you, but I believe Olaf is pretty good. I had the best kda, they just were better at objectives.

I know there are quite a few champions who are good against ranged carries, hands down no arguments there. I would just like to see how an only Melee champs or only Range Champs RGM would turn out. We do have the PBE to test it out and if it's a bust then so be it, th work can be scrapped down and put towards another RGM in development.
But who pays for the project? They need something that can work with a little revising. Not entirely scrapped.

Ok I guess scrapped was the wrong term used, I meant more towards recycling the gamemode if it does fall flat of expectations. Who would pay for the project I'm not sure but Nexus Siege is not an Original Riot Gamemode, The idea was actually taken off the boards from a player who proposed the idea about 2-3 years back, it was meant to teach players how to play against siege comps since they were so prevalent at the time.
f5 intensifies
Fite me m8
